Five remaining members of Australian ‘Bali Nine’ drug ring return home from Indonesian jail https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/heroin-smugglers-australia-says-bali-nine-prisoners-have-returned-home-from-indonesia/2OPMXQKOMJFJTACHJ7NAMNQSMY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/heroin-smugglers-australia-says-bali-nine-prisoners-have-returned-home-from-indonesia/2OPMXQKOMJFJTACHJ7NAMNQSMY/ The five surviving members of the drug ring have returned to Australia. Sun, 15 Dec 2024 07:18:21 +0000 This combo shows photos taken between February, 13, 2006 and February, 15, 2006 of Australian drug smugglers knows as the "Bali Nine": (top from L to R) Myuran Sukumaran, Scott Rush, Tach Duc Thanh Nguyen, Renae Lawrence, and (bottom row L to R) Si Yi Chen, Matthew Norman, Michael Czugaj, Martin Stephen and Andrew Chan, at various stages of their trials in Denpasar, Bali island. The five remaining members of the Australian “Bali Nine” drug ring have returned home after 19 years in jail in Indonesia. Photo / AFP

Corrections deploys staff to private Auckland prison where gang members filmed TikToks on smuggled phones https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Corrections-deploys-staff-to-private-auckland-prison-where-gang-members-filmed-tiktoks-on-smuggled-phones/HRJ3NDM2NRGTNHLVYGUEDSBMUY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Corrections-deploys-staff-to-private-auckland-prison-where-gang-members-filmed-tiktoks-on-smuggled-phones/HRJ3NDM2NRGTNHLVYGUEDSBMUY/ George BlockThe Ombudsman has also raised concerns over the treatment of people inside Auckland South. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Convicted double-murderer Mikaere Puata Chaney and other inmates feature in a string of photos taken behind bars at Auckland South Corrections Facility, then posted to instgram. Staff at the Serco-run prison have seized a phone and asked Instagram to remove the account.
